title: Unlocking the Power of Spatial and Temporal Information in Medical Multimodal Pre-training
details: J Yang, B Su, WX Zhao, JR Wen - arXiv preprint arXiv:2405.19654, 2024
abstract: Medical vision-language pre-training methods mainly leverage the correspondence between paired medical images and radiological reports. Although multi-view spatial images and temporal sequences of image-report pairs are available in off-the-shelf …

abstract: Objectives This study aimed to assess the reliability of AI-based Diagnocat system that assists the healthcare processes in the diagnosis of caries on intraoral radiographs. Methods The proximal surfaces of the 323 selected teeth on the …
